fields.title: Cleanup ticket branches on close
fields.body:
If a ticket is closed and has commits, delete the ticket branch.  The commit history will be preserved by the patchset refs.  If a ticket is reopened and has a patchset, recreate the ticket branch.  This will mean that ticket branches are open tickets.

The ticket page will need some adjustments to remove references to the ticket branch for closed tickets.

comment.text: This has been addressed by the **SmartTicketBranches** plugin.
